mapper.update: update base_user set userid=userid ,username=#{username} ,password=#{password} ,relname=#{relname} ,birthday=#{birthday} ,address=#{address} ,email=#{email} ,sex=#{sex} ,qq=#{qq} ,wechat=#{wechat} ,alipay=#{alipay} ,userpic=#{userpic} ,integration=#{integration} ,userlevel=#{userlevel} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,depid=#{depid} ,telphone=#{telphone} ,status=#{status} ,wrongpass=#{wrongpass} ,relpass=#{relpass} ,lastlogin=#{lastlogin} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,guid=#{guid} where userid=#{userid}

update base_user set userid=userid ,username=#{username} ,password=#{password} ,relname=#{relname} ,birthday=#{birthday} ,address=#{address} ,email=#{email} ,sex=#{sex} ,qq=#{qq} ,wechat=#{wechat} ,alipay=#{alipay} ,userpic=#{userpic} ,integration=#{integration} ,userlevel=#{userlevel} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,depid=#{depid} ,telphone=#{telphone} ,status=#{status} ,wrongpass=#{wrongpass} ,relpass=#{relpass} ,lastlogin=#{lastlogin} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,guid=#{guid} where 1=1 and userid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and userid =#{Where_Id} and userid=#{Where_userid} and username=#{Where_username} and password=#{Where_password} and relname=#{Where_relname} and birthday=#{Where_birthday} and address=#{Where_address} and email=#{Where_email} and sex=#{Where_sex} and qq=#{Where_qq} and wechat=#{Where_wechat} and alipay=#{Where_alipay} and userpic=#{Where_userpic} and integration=#{Where_integration} and userlevel=#{Where_userlevel} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and depid=#{Where_depid} and telphone=#{Where_telphone} and status=#{Where_status} and wrongpass=#{Where_wrongpass} and relpass=#{Where_relpass} and lastlogin=#{Where_lastlogin} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and guid=#{Where_guid}
mapper.select: select t.userid "userid", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.relname "relname", t.birthday "birthday", t.address "address", t.email "email", t.sex "sex", t.qq "qq", t.wechat "wechat", t.alipay "alipay", t.userpic "userpic", t.integration "integration", t.userlevel "userlevel", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.depid "depid", t.telphone "telphone", t.status "status", t.wrongpass "wrongpass", t.relpass "relpass", t.lastlogin "lastlogin", t.createtime "createtime", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.guid "guid" from base_user t where userid=#{userid}

select t.userid "userid", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.relname "relname", t.birthday "birthday", t.address "address", t.email "email", t.sex "sex", t.qq "qq", t.wechat "wechat", t.alipay "alipay", t.userpic "userpic", t.integration "integration", t.userlevel "userlevel", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.depid "depid", t.telphone "telphone", t.status "status", t.wrongpass "wrongpass", t.relpass "relpass", t.lastlogin "lastlogin", t.createtime "createtime", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.guid "guid" from base_user t where 1=1 and t.userid=#{userid} and t.username=#{username} and t.password=#{password} and t.relname=#{relname} and t.birthday=#{birthday} and t.address=#{address} and t.email=#{email} and t.sex=#{sex} and t.qq=#{qq} and t.wechat=#{wechat} and t.alipay=#{alipay} and t.userpic=#{userpic} and t.integration=#{integration} and t.userlevel=#{userlevel} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.depid=#{depid} and t.telphone=#{telphone} and t.status=#{status} and t.wrongpass=#{wrongpass} and t.relpass=#{relpass} and t.lastlogin=#{lastlogin} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.guid=#{guid}

mapper.delete: delete from base_user where 1=1 and userid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and userid =#{Where_Id} and userid=#{Where_userid} and username=#{Where_username} and password=#{Where_password} and relname=#{Where_relname} and birthday=#{Where_birthday} and address=#{Where_address} and email=#{Where_email} and sex=#{Where_sex} and qq=#{Where_qq} and wechat=#{Where_wechat} and alipay=#{Where_alipay} and userpic=#{Where_userpic} and integration=#{Where_integration} and userlevel=#{Where_userlevel} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and depid=#{Where_depid} and telphone=#{Where_telphone} and status=#{Where_status} and wrongpass=#{Where_wrongpass} and relpass=#{Where_relpass} and lastlogin=#{Where_lastlogin} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and guid=#{Where_guid}

select count(*) from base_user t where 1=1 and t.userid=#{userid} and t.userid!=#{NoId} and t.username like #{username} and t.password=#{password} and t.relname=#{relname} and t.birthday=#{birthday} and t.address=#{address} and t.email=#{email} and t.sex=#{sex} and t.qq=#{qq} and t.wechat=#{wechat} and t.alipay=#{alipay} and t.userpic=#{userpic} and t.integration=#{integration} and t.userlevel=#{userlevel} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.depid=#{depid} and t.telphone=#{telphone} and t.status=#{status} and t.wrongpass=#{wrongpass} and t.relpass=#{relpass} and t.lastlogin=#{lastlogin} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.guid=#{guid}
